papers.title: The influence of counterparty risk on financial stability in a stylized banking system
papers.citation: A. Birch (2016). The influence of counterparty risk on financial stability in a stylized banking system. Unknown Journal. Citations: 0, Influential: 0.

summary (tldr).text: A simple counterparty risk model replicates the behaviour of more complex simulation-based stress test models of a heterogeneous banking system and is found that the interbank network is essential for the insolvency propagation.
